Niwa outlook: What an ‘atypical’ El Niño means for your summer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/niwa-outlook-what-an-atropic-el-nino-means-for-your-summer/54IBZHFG7BEHZBAWG2XY6FZGQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/niwa-outlook-what-an-atropic-el-nino-means-for-your-summer/54IBZHFG7BEHZBAWG2XY6FZGQ4/ Jamie MortonAn 'atypical' El Niño means there'll be variability amid driver's usual summer flavours.
